p: After 150 days, fish fed on diet containing 100 ppm (D100) oregano EO showed a significantly ( p < 0.05) higher final body weight compared both to control (CD) and 200 ppm EO diet (D200) ( Table 3 and Supplementary Table S1). Similarly, the highest ( p < 0.05) specific growth rate (SGR) value was found in D100. Weight values recorded at each sampling point were shown in Table S2 of the Supplementary Files.
